aboutCards.title: Who we are?
aboutCards.text: Suppliers of nuts, dried fruits and legumes of the finest quality from Uzbekistan

aboutCards.title: What we do?
aboutCards.text: We deliver selected products to customers all over the world

aboutCards.title: How we do it?
aboutCards.text: Quickly, accurately, efficiently and with a guarantee of results

descriptions.text: MT FOODSTUFF TRADING is a reputable and dynamic company specializing in the supply of dried fruits, nuts, and legumes sourced from Uzbekistan.

Our founder brings a wealth of experience in exporting these products to various markets, including CIS countries, the Middle East, and the EU. This expertise equips us with the knowledge to effectively source our goods, ensuring we focus on quality, proper packaging, and safe delivery to our customers—all while maintaining competitive pricing.
We firmly believe that honesty and sincerity are the cornerstones of lasting partnerships. Therefore, we collaborate with partners who share these values.

delivery.bottomText: We comply with the terms of delivery

infosBox.title: Products
infosBox.text: Peanuts, almonds, walnuts, Hungarian prunes, green mung beans

infosBox.title: Products
infosBox.text: All kinds of raisins, Spanish prunes

infosBox.title: Products
infosBox.text: Dried apricots, mung beans, compote mixture

infosBox.title: Products
infosBox.text: Sunflower seeds, green mung beans, kidney beans

infosBox.title: Factory power
infosBox.text: up to 5 tons per day (walnuts), the rest - up to 20 tons per day

delivery.text: We collect products from all over Uzbekistan, we know the peculiarities of each region, we will help you choose a product for your task.
delivery.title: From where and how do we deliver?

tronsport.text: Ardena Transport — the most trusted shipping company with the best prices.
Allow Green Logistics — a company with its own trucks in the CIS.
Kreiss.lv — thanks to its own numerous trucks, it is profitable to deliver to Europe.
Polar Star Logistics — have many years of experience in air transportation and provide the best prices.

trusted.text: CSE — the most reliable office for sample delivery in the CIS.
DHL — a world-famous service with which we have an exclusive contract that gives a significant discount on services.

accordion.title: Where are you ready to export?
accordion.content: To Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Azerbaijan (Baku), Tajikistan, Turkmenistan, Afghanistan, Russia, Mongolia, Ukraine, Poland and Belarus.

accordion.title: What is the minimum order quantity?
accordion.content: The minimum order quantity is 18 tons.

accordion.title: How are damages reimbursed in the event of a marriage?
accordion.content: Within 5 days after receiving the goods, you must send a letter of complaint to our e-mail. It is important to indicate in the letter all the actual evidence of the marriage on our part. If there is evidence, we will fully compensate for the damage with money or a new product.

accordion.title: How can I pay?
accordion.content: Only by bank transfer - or T /T or L/C at sight.

hero.heroFormText: Our staff will contact you for a free consultation within 3 days
hero.heroText: Timely delivery considering all the wishes of the client
hero.heroTitle: Nuts, dried fruits and legumes of the finest quality from Uzbekistan

tabResult.title: We understand what is important
tabResult.text: We know about all the nuances of working with products

rows.title: Quantity in 100 grams
rows.text: We know exactly how many units of goods are in 100 grams of products

rows.title: European humidity standards
rows.text: We guarantee compliance with the humidity agreed with the client

rows.title: Two stages of cleaning
rows.text: Dried fruits often have small particles of sand and dirt - in our products this can occur only in 2% of cases.

rows.title: Mandatory fumigation
rows.text: We clean the products either before shipping in a special zone, or after loading in a car

rows.title: Stable quality
rows.text: Each time the quality of the product will remain unchanged. We can control this thanks to our confident positions in 8 regions of the country and the ease of extraction of raw materials

tabResult.title: We understand what is important
tabResult.text: We know about all the nuances of working with products

rows.title: Separate container for each type
rows.text: Nuts are a very fragile commodity, so we select a special container for each type

rows.title: Humidity control
rows.text: The increased humidity of nuts is a serious drawback, so we have several stages of humidity control

rows.title: Automatic sorting
rows.text: Manual recheck and additional peeling on the inspection tables.

rows.title: Drying, grading and packaging
rows.text: To ensure the desired caliber, we sort the goods on the line according to templates

tabResult.title: We understand what is important
tabResult.text: We know about all the nuances of working with products

rows.title: Quantity in 100 grams
rows.text: We know exactly how many units of goods are in 100 grams of products

rows.title: Humidity control
rows.text: The increased humidity of nuts is a serious drawback, so we have several stages of humidity control

rows.title: Careful cleaning
rows.text: Depending on the type of product, we clean manually or automatically

nutsValley.text: MT FOODSTUFF TRADING is an experienced exporter of nuts, dried fruits, and legumes to all CIS countries: Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Azerbaijan, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan, Afghanistan, Russia, Mongolia, Ukraine, Poland, and Belarus.
nutsValley.title: Natural production, timely delivery, compensation for defects

products.text: We supply the best nuts, dried fruits and legumes in Uzbekistan. We find the caliber you need and control the humidity.
products.title: Our Products

descriptions.text: Everything is according to plan — you always know exactly when your cargo has set off, where it is now and when it will arrive. Your peace of mind is important to us.
The best quality — cheaper than everywhere else. We strive to offer the best prices on the market for the finest quality goods.

quality.text: We prove that experience, care, standards and responsibility guarantee the result.
quality.title: Qualities we are proud of
